note:
Address: New York, NY

Denise Drace-Brownell of New York is an author and businessperson focused on raising private equity and consulting for the medical device, healthcare, engineering and related markets. Ms. Drace Brownell co-wrote The First Nazi: Erich Ludendorff, the Man Who Made Hitler Possible with Will Brownell which has received critical acclaim. Denise Drace-Brownell is also known for having developed a revolutionary type of vision system for people suffering from binocular vision...
